LanguageData.HideDesc_Generic: An untanned animal skin. It can be tanned in a tanning vat to produce {TANNED_label}.
LanguageData.WoolPeltDesc: The unprocessed pelt of a woolly animal. It can be tanned as is to get {TANNED_label}, or the {WOOL_label} can be cut away from the hide. Without the wool, this will be {SHORN_label}.
